member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession.Close
member.summary: Indicates that the application no longer needs the session and the Content Decryption Module (CDM) should release any resources associated with the session and close it.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession.GenerateRequest
member.summary: Generates a license request based on the provided data.
member.param: A LPCWSTR specifying the type of the data provided in the initData parameter. The string format is specified by the Encrypted Media Extension specification's Initialization Data Type.
A BYTE array containing initialization data. The data format is specified by the Encrypted Media Extension specification's Initialization Data.
The size of the BYTE array provided in the initData parameter.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession.GetExpiration
member.summary: Gets the expiration time for all keys in the session as determined by the Content Decryption Module (CDM).
member.param: Receives a pointer to an LPWSTR representing the session ID or NaN if no such time exists or if the license explicitly never expires.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession.GetKeyStatuses
member.summary: Gets a reference to an array of structures that represent the key IDs known to the Content Decryption Module (CDM) session and the current status of the associated key.
member.param: Receives a pointer to an array of structures containing the IDs and statuses of the keys known to the CDM session.
Receives the number of structures present in the keyStatuses array.
member.returns: Returns S_OK. If an error occurs, the returned key status list is empty.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession.GetSessionId
member.summary: Gets a unique string identifier generated by the Content Decryption Module (CDM) that can be used by the application to identify session objects.
member.param: Receives a pointer to an LPWSTR representing the session ID.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession.Load
member.summary: Loads the data for the specified session into the IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession object.
member.param: The unique identifier of the session to load.
Receives a pointer to a BOOL indicating if the session data was loaded successfully.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession.Remove
member.summary: Removes all licenses and keys associated with the session.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession.Update
member.summary: Provides messages, including licenses, to the Content Decryption Module (CDM) session. Persisted data should not be released or cleared.
member.param: The size of the BYTE array provided in the response parameter.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleSession
member.summary: Provides access to the Content Decryption Module (CDM) for encrypted media extensions support.
